name: Figma
title: figma.com
shortDescription: Figma is a collaborative interface design tool that enables users to design, prototype, and gather feedback in a single platform. It's designed for designers, developers, and project teams. Users can create responsive websites, produce on-brand assets, and even use AI features to enhance their design process. An example use case is a design team collaborating in real-time to create and prototype a new app interface.
cons: Can be overwhelming for new users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on vector UI design with a Mac app
